description_html:
This Mid-Century inspired design features a twin shade design, with an outer sheer shade around a clear inner glass form. The ceiling canopy and frame are in a warm antique brass finish.

• 22 1/2" high x 19" wide.
• Outer shade is 19" wide x 4 3/4" high.
• Includes 6-feet of chain. 12-feet of clear wire. One 8" downrod.
• Uses one maximum 60 watt or equivalent E26 base bulb (not included).
• Warm antique brass finish metal frame.
• Silver organza outer shade and clear inner glass.
product_name: Layne Warm Antique Brass Pendant Light by Possini Euro Design
